name: Linkedin authentication using Oauth 2.0
tagline: A simple android project implementing Oauth 2.0 for logging in using a LinkedIn account.
body:
### Getting started:

  You need to create a LinkedIn application and get the required API access token and secret. https://developer.linkedin.com/docs/signin-with-linkedin
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
